articles.title: Deion Sanders will donate half of salary to complete football facility - Clarion Ledger
articles.description: Deion Sanders will donate half of his salary to make sure JSU's renovations to its football facility will be completed on time
articles.content:
Jackson State football coach Deion Sanders will donate half of his salary to make sure the program's renovations to its football facility will be completed on time, he announced on Instagram. 
Sande… [+1169 chars]
